title: 179: Mini-bulks & mini-cuts for more muscle and less fat
description: For many muscle builders bulking and cutting are extreme events, blowing up like marshmallows and then undergoing long, painful periods of deprivation to lose the fat. Is this really the best method for building more muscle? Sal, Adam & Justin argue lay out why the better approach is using mini-bulks and mini-cuts to take advantage of the short-term anabolic benefits of eating in an excess without putting on a detrimental amount of fat. Please subscribe, rate and review this show! Learn more about Mind Pump at www.mindpumpradio.com
